700876f-a.text:
E. Fordham Road (rimht), at E.Kingsbridge Road (left), showing the small public place, known as John E. Bryan Park, being improved by the Works Progress Administration. The view
is eastward.
August 10, 1937
W.P.A. Photo
Five Boroughs Proiect

700874f-a.text:
313 to 329 (left to right) E. Fordham Road, east side, at its junction with E. Kingsbridge Road. No. 313 is the Windsor Theatre.
May 11, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
